Copyrights at Penguin Random House US • Columbia Publishing Course alum.
Freelance Editor #Folklore, #Horror, #SFF • Member of EFA, ACES, PEN, PEN America.
#AmWriting #AmEditing. Pronouns: she/her. Opinions my own.

Avatar: Headshot of me in a navy-blue dress and white blazer with black trim in front of the backlit bookcases in the PRH US lobby.

Header: Books with pens & trinkets. Titles are about mythology, SFF, writing craft, & publishing. Statues: angel with lyre (L), decorative skull (R).
